TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中, 当您从源切换到设计视图时, 将分析描述控件的标记源代码, 并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时, 会将设计时控件持久保存到标记源代码, 并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类的属性提供以下功能:The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 属性返回一个对象, 该对象通常包含一个对象, 该对象是从设计器的继承树中的每个级别派生的。 The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性返回格式设置方案的集合, 以便在 "自动套用格式" 对话框中显示。 The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 属性为关联的模板返回模板组的集合。 The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated . - 属性始终返回`true`, 指示设计器创建关联的的临时副本以生成设计时标记。 The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供了以下功能:The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法返回用于在设计时呈现关联的标记。 The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法准备设计器, 以查看、编辑和设计关联的。 The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 当数据源的架构发生关联的更改时, 将调用方法。The method is called when the schema of the data source for the associated changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类, 以便在设计时更改从控件派生的控件的外观。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例`MyFormView` 从控件派生控件。The example derives the `MyFormView` control from the control. 只是的副本。 `MyFormView`The `MyFormView` is simply a copy of the . 该示例还从派生`MyFormViewDesigner`类, 并在`MyFormView`控件上放置的`MyFormViewDesigner`对象。The example also derives the `MyFormViewDesigner` class from the and places a object for the `MyFormViewDesigner` on the `MyFormView` control. `MyFormViewDesigner`重写以下项:The `MyFormViewDesigner` overrides the following items: - 用于指定的设计时视图`MyFormView`的页导航行包含四个页面链接的属性。The property to specify that the pager row for the design-time view of the `MyFormView` contain four page links. - 在设计时将属性作为`MyFormView`新的第一行添加到网格中的方法(如果已指定)。The method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyFormView` grid at design time. 如果的 `MyFormView`属性为 或值, 则会在控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框, 使其范围更可见。If the property of the `MyFormView` is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在设计图面上创建关联 控件或控件的副本时, .NET Framework 在内部构造类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of the control on the design surface.

span.span: Gets the collection of automatic formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是从内部类的 XML 编码成员填充的。The object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已为控件定义项模板 , 则方法将控件的集合设置为空数组 (如果无法获取数据源的架构)。If an item template has been defined for the control, the method sets the collection of the control to an empty array if the schema for the data source cannot be obtained. 刷新对象以强制调用方法。 The refreshes the object to force a call to the method. 然后 , 调用基方法来生成标记。The then calls the base method to generate the markup. 如果没有为控件定义任何项模板, 则会调用方法来生成呈现为占位符的标记。If no item template has been defined for the control, the calls the method to generate markup that renders to a placeholder. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 从类继承的类中重写方法, 以便在设计时更改控件的外观。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 如果定义了, 则该示例向网格中添加一个新的第一行以包含属性。 The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果派生自的控件的属性为或值,则会在控件周围绘制一个蓝色虚线边框,使其范围更可见。If the property of the control that is derived from the is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 该示例不更改控件的运行时外观。The example does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果重写方法, 请务必调用基方法, 因为它最终会通过多个重写级别、对控件的调用或控件的副本来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件占位符的标记文本。

span.span: Gets the markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含在设计图面上呈现到占位符的标记文本。

span.span: A containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件的标记不包括其中一个项模板, 则方法将调用方法, 该方法将生成占位符的标记, 其中包含有关如何编辑模板内容和消息的说明。项模板是必需的。If the markup for the control does not include one of the item templates, the method calls the method, which generates the markup for a placeholder that contains instructions on how to edit template content and a message that an item template is required.

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器宿主准备好使用设计器呈现控件时, 将调用方法。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 及其基方法会配置属性并连接到设计器操作所需的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. 参数是与此设计器或控件的副本关联的控件。 `component`The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control.

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源架构更改时，将调用它。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非设计器处于模板编辑模式或正在添加或编辑字段, 否则方法会调用方法, 该方法又调用方法来更新控件以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

span.span: The properties for the class of the component.

summary.span: 设计时在设计宿主的属性网格中添加或移除属性，或提供可能与关联控件上的属性相对应的新设计时属性。

span.span: Adds or removes properties in the properties grid in a design host at design time, or provides new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderOuterTable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定 控件是否使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则。

span.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: 如果该控件使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在标记中使用外部表容器来应用内联样式规则。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 您可以通过将此属性设置为来`true`删除外部表容器。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`. 这为在控件标记中应用 CSS 样式规则提供了灵活性。This provides flexibility in applying CSS style rules in the control markup.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取要显示的关联控件的示例行数。

span.span: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终返回`2`。The always returns `2`. 如果模式为数值模式, 这将导致在设计时在控件的页导航行中显示两个页面链接。 This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the control at design time, if the mode is numeric. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类继承的类中的属性, 以更改设计时在控件的页导航行中显示的页面链接数。The following code example shows how to override the property in a class that is inherited from the class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the control at design time. 该示例将导致显示四个页面链接。The example causes four page links to display. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#2)]

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中为 中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造对象的集合, 每个对象对应关联控件中的一个控件模板。 The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each control template in the associated control. 控件模板包括页眉、页脚、页导航、项、编辑项、插入项和空数据。The control templates are the header, footer, pager, item, edit item, insert item, and empty data. 控件模板元素包含单个对象。The control template elements contain a single object.

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终为 true, 所以设计器使用包含关联控件的副本的控件来生成设计时标记。 Because the property is always true, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控件不影响的任何持久性。 The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果已重写`false` 属性以返回, 设计器将使用关联的自身来生成设计时标记。 If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或根据控件是否用类级别对象标记来确定其值。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level object.

para.span: 如果未重写, 则控件将忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the control ignores the .

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器
